name: Sticky Blocks
description:
Sticky Blocks is a puzzle game where your player is part of the problem and solution. You can control multiple block and can join them together to traverse puzzles that would be impossible for a single block.

CONTROLS
  • WASD - Move the player
  • QE - Change active block
  • F - Restart a level
  • Click-and-Drag left or right - rotate the level
  • CTRL - Show movement directions

This prototype has 7 levels. 1-6 are introductory levels, and level 7 is a more challenging puzzle.

(Sticky Blocks was created in 48 hours for the2021 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.).
